'''''J.R.R. Tolkien''''' is a [[1969]] critical study of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] by Catharine R. Stimpson, then an Assistant Professor of English at [[Wikipedia:Barnard College|Barnard College]]. The booklet consists of a single essay (no chapters), and includes a Selected Bibliography about works by and about Tolkien.
